name: Pinecone
description: Integrate with Pinecone to list, query, upsert and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Indexes
tools.description: List all Pinecone indexes in the account. Returns index names, dimensions, and status.

tools.name: Query
tools.description: Query a Pinecone index for the nearest vectors to a given query vector. Returns IDs, scores, and optional metadata.

tools.name: Upsert
tools.description: Upsert vectors into a Pinecone index. Insert new vectors or update existing ones by ID.

tools.name: Describe Index
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Pinecone index including its configuration, status, and stats.

tools.name: Delete Vectors
tools.description: Delete vectors from a Pinecone index by ID list, by metadata filter, or delete all vectors in a namespace.
